title: Corda P2P Link Manager Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the P2P link manager.

maxMessageSize.description: The maximal message size in bytes.

replayAlgorithm.description: The maximal message size in bytes.

exponentialBackoff.description: Replay messages with capped exponential backoff.

baseReplayPeriod.description: The message replay period base in milliseconds.

replayPeriodCutoff.description: The message replay period base in milliseconds.

constant.description: Replay messages at a constant rate.

messageReplayPeriod.description: The message replay period in milliseconds.

maxReplayingMessages.description: The maximum number of replaying messages between two peers.

heartbeatMessagePeriod.description: Heartbeat message period in milli seconds.

sessionsPerPeer.description: The number of sessions between two peers.
